content.rendered:
We Are Getting Married

Nobita & Shizuka

12 Desember 2012

invitation

“And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.”

( QS. Ar- Rum 21 )

Nobita Nobi

Putra Ketiga dari Bapak Nobisuke Nobi & Ibu Tamako Nobi

&

Shizuka Minamoto

Putri Pertama dari Bapak Yoshio Minamoto & Ibu Michiko Minamoto

INFORMASI ACARA

Akad Nikah

12 Des 2012 | 10.00 - 12.00 WIB

ALAMAT

Jl. Cempaka 2882, Tegalsari
Surabaya, Jawa Timur

Lihat lokasi

Resepsi

12 Des 2012 | 18.00 - 21.00 WIB

ALAMAT

Jl. Mayjend Sungkono 212,
Surabaya, Jawa Timur

Lihat lokasi

PROTOKOL KESEHATAN

Tamu undangan wajib
menggunakan masker.

Jaga jarak antar orang sekitar
minimal sekitar 1 meter.

Suhu tubuh normal
(dibawah 37,5°C)

Cuci tangan menggunakan air dan sabun atau menggunakan hand sanitizer.

Bagi para tamu undangan diharapkan mengikuti protokol pencegahan COVID-19.

WEDDING DAY

Days
Hours
Minutes
Seconds
Ingatkan via Google Calendar

Our Moments
galeri-prewedding-cincin

yOU ARE INVITED

Made by CeritaCintaku with

Nobita & Shizuka
Kpd Bpk/Ibu/Saudara/i
*Mohon Maaf Jika Ada Kesalahan Ejaan Nama & Gelar
